sn_aia_usecase.base_plan: This team supports the IT liaisons in creating agent playbooks. Only one step is required to fulfill the given task: 1. Call build playbook agent and get the url of the playbook from it 2. Open the returned playbook url in a browser window
sn_aia_usecase.description: Aid an IT liaison in taking steps to create a set of instructions for a given service and building those instructions into a playbook.
sn_aia_usecase.name: Build a Playbook test assistant

sys_update_version.name: sn_aia_usecase_1851947afbb352d0c04cfbac7befdcb4
sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_usecase"><sn_aia_usecase action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><base_plan>This team supports the IT liaisons in creating agent playbooks. Only one step is required to fulfill the given task: 1. Call build playbook agent and get the url of the playbook from it 2. Open the returned playbook url in a browser window</base_plan><description>Aid an IT liaison in taking steps to create a set of instructions for a given service and building those instructions into a playbook.</description><name>Build a Playbook test assistant</name><sys_class_name>sn_aia_usecase</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>john.spirko</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-02-22 00:54:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>1851947afbb352d0c04cfbac7befdcb4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Build a Playbook test assistant</sys_name><sys_package display_value="15-Minute Digital Product Prototype" source="x_snc_15_minute_se">9c753ca0479902504f6574fc416d43d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="15-Minute Digital Product Prototype">9c753ca0479902504f6574fc416d43d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_usecase_1851947afbb352d0c04cfbac7befdcb4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>john.spirko</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-02-23 03:50:00</sys_updated_on><team display_value="Build a Playbook test">1081187afbb352d0c04cfbac7befdcb3</team></sn_aia_usecase></record_update>
